description: Enterprise techniques used by Sharpshooter, ATT&CK group G0104 v1.0
name: Sharpshooter (G0104)

techniques.comment: [Sharpshooter](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0104)'s first-stage downloader installed [Rising Sun](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0448) to the startup folder %Startup%\mssync.exe.(Citation: McAfee Sharpshooter December 2018)
[Sharpshooter](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0104)'s first-stage downloader was a VBA macro.(Citation: McAfee Sharpshooter December 2018)
[Sharpshooter](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0104) downloaded additional payloads after a target was infected with a first-stage downloader.(Citation: McAfee Sharpshooter December 2018)
[Sharpshooter](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0104) has sent malicious Word OLE documents to victims.(Citation: McAfee Sharpshooter December 2018)

[Sharpshooter](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0104)'s first-stage downloader resolved various Windows libraries and APIs, including LoadLibraryA(), GetProcAddress(), and CreateProcessA().(Citation: McAfee Sharpshooter December 2018)
[Sharpshooter](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0104) has sent malicious attachments via emails to targets.(Citation: McAfee Sharpshooter December 2018)
[Sharpshooter](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0104) has leveraged embedded shellcode to inject a downloader into the memory of Word.(Citation: McAfee Sharpshooter December 2018)
[Sharpshooter](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0104) has sent malicious DOC and PDF files to targets so that they can be opened by a user.(Citation: McAfee Sharpshooter December 2018)
